entities.name: trapdoor
entities.description: The trapdoor is mentioned as the entrance to a hidden place.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story and is described as whispering.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character who is described as saying 'It's the full Body-Bind'.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a main character who has been bound by the Body-Bind curse.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character who is described as saying 'You'll understand later, Neville'.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is an object that the characters use to hide.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a character who is feared by the main characters and is described as being like every statue's shadow.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who is feared by the main characters and is described as being like every distant breath of wind.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is Filch's cat who is described as skulking near the top of the stairs.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Neville, who has been bound by the Body-Bind curse.
Hermione is apologetic to Neville for binding him with the Body-Bind curse.
Ron is reassuring Neville that he will understand later.
Harry uses the Invisibility Cloak to hide.
Ron also uses the Invisibility Cloak to hide.
Harry is afraid of Filch, who is described as being like every statue's shadow.
Ron is also afraid of Peeves, who is described as being like every distant breath of wind.
Harry is cautious with Mrs Norris, who is described as skulking near the top of the stairs.
